synopsis.text: Five days a week, they're sworn enemies, locked in a battle for world domination. But on the weekends, Fudou Aikawa and Desumi Magahara are secretly a couple, trying to navigate their first relationship while keeping it hidden from their respective teams. As the leader of the Gelato 5, Fudou is known as 'Red Gelato' and is dedicated to protecting Japan. Meanwhile, Desumi is a combatant leader of the evil secret society, Gekko, and is known as the 'Reaper Princess.' Despite their differences, they're determined to make their relationship work, even if it means sneaking around and dodging suspicion from their comrades. But with loyalties divided, they'll have to stay on guard to keep their love a secret. Will they be able to find a balance between love and war? Only time will tell in this unique romance between sworn enemies.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
